name: Bouncy Bois - 3 Hour Game
description:
If your cursor still shows up, try clicking on the game itself - it should disappear and you can use esc to get back!

Bounce the wall around and have fun... Not many levels and no play testing done, but only had like 2 1/2 hours so hope it's kinda fun!

All Textures can be found on the right... Feel free to use them for your own stuff if you ever need some really quickly made assets :P
